name: Cube-Step
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME IS ONLY A DEMO AND IS NOT FINISHED YET. (PLEASE READ THE DEVLOG BELOW)

Cube-Step is a rougelike 2D platformer game where you play as a cube who has stumbled upon the infamous, axolotl cave.

In this spiritual successor to the previous, open soured project infinit. You take on the task of an explorer who runs and chops through randomly generated levels, but make sure to watch your steps, for there might be red blocks, red blocks, and even more red blocks!

ProgrammingGrowdotSound effectsGrowdotArtGrowdot (most of the art.), M1A2 (The royal cube skin.)Skin designs
Growdot, M1A2, Snowflake, Intwistt, Yopo.Music

And hey, while you're here. Why not Buy me a cup of coffee?

Is itch.io not your type? Then get it on itch.io again!
